me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.geometry

Class PointSlope

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.geometry.SlopeIntercept
      • me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.geometry.PointSlope
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, LinearEquation

    public class PointSlope
extends SlopeIntercept
    Another implementation of the LinearEquation interface. y - y1 = m(x - x1) or y = m(x - x1) + y1

    Internally, this simply converts the point slope into a slope intercept. This means you can't get "the point."

    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Colin Robertson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
